snippet: A man accused of writing anti-Muslim comments on an Ohio mosque has been charged with committing a hate crime....

headline.main: Ben Martin, Time Photographer Who Captured the 1960s, Dies at 86
headline.print_headline: Ben Martin, Time Photographer Who Captured the 1960s, Dies at 86

lead_paragraph: A man accused of writing anti-Muslim comments on an Ohio mosque has been charged with committing a hate crime.
